text: John Charles Burdett (13 March 1928 - 25 November 1993) was an Australian politician. He was a Liberal member of the South Australian Legislative Council from 1973 to 1993; he died shortly before he was due to retire at the general election. He was Minister for Consumer Affairs and Community Welfare from 1979 to 1982. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Liberal Party of Australia members of the Parliament of South Australia Category:Members of the South Australian Legislative Council Category:Place of birth missing Category:20th-century Australian politicians
title: John Burdett (politician)
